con:config.con:query: Select B.id_booking, B.cod_booking, B.cod_market, B.amt_total_price, B.cod_currency, B.cod_status As estadobooking, B.cod_sub_status As subestadobooking, S.* From booking B Inner Join flight_hotel_package HP On B.id_booking = HP.id_booking Inner Join settlement S On S.id_booking = B.id_booking Inner Join payment_order P On P.id_settlement = S.id_settlement Where B.cod_booking = :cod_booking Order By B.id_booking Desc
